column4: Any idea why some websites are loading fine for me while others return a blank page? I'm on a fresh install...
which websites return a blank page?
Seemingly random sites, ubuntu.com works fine but ubuntuforums.org doesn't. Not sure about a proxy, but I am behind a router.
The sites that work seem to change, as well, Google was working but isn't any longer...
do other computers on your network do this?
